utter_gratitude.text: We are always here for you
We are happy as long as you are

utter_ask_address.text: Can you give me your address where you want your food to be dilivered?

utter_ask_date.text: Which day you want to come?

utter_ask_selectedfood.text: Want do you want to eat?

utter_invoice.text: You will always get an invoice/receipt after ordering something.

utter_seat_place_wishes.text: We will try to accommodate your seating request. Unfortunately this is not always possible.

utter_to_go_pizza.text: Of cource you can take your food home.

utter_delivery_time.text: We try our best to keep the dilivery time under 30 minutes.

utter_knowledge.text: You can ask me everything you want about our Restaurant. Additionaly you can reservate and order throught the Chat

utter_delivery.text: Yes of course, just tell us that you would like to order something

utter_payments.text: We accept cash, card and paypal

utter_contact.text: You can call us at (+49 123 456789) or you can just talk to me :)

utter_opening_hours.text: We are open from Tuesday to Sunday between 11 am and 12 pm.

utter_vegetarian.text: Yes of course, my favorit vegan dish is the Pizza Marinara, thats a pizza without cheese, only with sauce.

utter_location.text: Pizzaria Romano is located in: Marktstra√üe 1, 72793 Pfullingen.

utter_opinion.text: We do our best to satisfy your wishes. If you really care about giving feedback, just call us.

utter_parking.text: We have wonderful free Parking spots right infront of our restaurant.

utter_smalltalk/ask_mood.text: Im glad that you aksed, im a little bit stressed but anyways i have fun at work :)

utter_smalltalk/ask_help.text: We are always there for you! Just aks me your questions

utter_smalltalk/ask_handlingdata.text: No worries. The chat and your messages will not be saved, i only telling the chef what you wanna eat.

utter_play_again.text: Do you want to play again?
